Elder Of Filar:
This is sign.
Once the king of the gnomes Of [lyusen] destroyed the earthworm Of [traskena] and sealed up it. However, recently before this territory considerably increased the influence of the goddess of the destruction Of [shilen], and evil woke up. Evil must be destroyed.
If the earthworm finds its [byluyu] force, then terrible tragedy will occur on this earth.
